channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- WebSphere Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- WebSphere Portal

item.title: CVE-2017-1536|2024-08-05T13:32:29.794Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM Support Tools for Lotus WCM (IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5 and 9.0) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 130733.

item.title: CVE-2018-1672|2024-08-05T04:07:44.078Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 may fail to set the correct user context in certain impersonation scenarios, which can allow a user to act with the identity of a different user. IBM X-Force ID: 144958.

item.title: CVE-2018-1736|2024-08-05T04:07:44.384Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 147906.

item.title: CVE-2017-1698|2024-08-05T13:39:32.237Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 could reveal sensitive information from an error message that could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 124390.

item.title: CVE-2017-1423|2024-08-05T13:32:29.583Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 8.5 and 9.0 exposes backend server URLs that are configured for usage by the Web Application Bridge component. IBM X-Force ID: 127476.

item.title: CVE-2017-1577|2024-08-05T13:39:32.036Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 132117.

item.title: CVE-2018-1420|2024-08-05T03:59:39.071Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 resets access control settings to the out of the box configuration during Combined Cumulative Fix (CF) installation. This can lead to security miss-configuration of the installation. IBM X-Force ID: 138950.

item.title: CVE-2017-1303|2024-08-05T13:32:29.467Z -- ibm -- websphere%20portal
item.description: IBM WebSphere Portal and Web Content Manager 7.0, 8.0, 8.5, and 9.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 125457.
